Text: I hate to think this, but I think the Covid19 virus was planned, not an accident! I think these riots were planned. Americans need to stand up and fight.
This is the visual that will define the entire failed Trumpian experiment. When his country needed a leader, Donald Trump turned off the lights and hid under the bed.
Prime Minister Trudeau just acknowledged that the government didn't even collect age data on #COVID19 cases. Did they not learn anything from SARS?
Trump incites violent police rampage against protestersTrump views the police as a potential power base for a dictatorial and fascistic regime#DCblackout #USAonFirehttps://t.co/jQB8hnbWXm

The disproportionate impact of Covid on Black and Hispanic Americans reveals broader inequities we must resolve. We must advance new policies to fix these problems and make sure the socially and medically and economically vulnerable have equal opportunity to protect their health.
#AmericaOrTrump I choose America. Trump can seek asylum in Russia, where his friend Putin awaits him with a vicious dog or two.

I'm in touch with someone who's on the governors' call with President Trump right now. They and others listening in are alarmed. The president is urging governors to take back the streets, not be "weak," and use force as the nation faces growing racial unrest.

Far left ; liberal media used to freak out when any group of Americans got together to do anything b/c #coronavirus !Now w/ #riots2020 sweeping the nation, massive throngs of leftists climbing all over each other to destroy America gets not a peep.I guess #COVID19 is over.
This is the visual that will define the entire failed Trumpian experiment. When his country needed a leader, Donald Trump turned off the lights and hid under the bed.
